verbose_text: Supporting this conclusion, Sox-2 expression was not qualitatively affected upon a constitutive activation of Notch signaling by expressing the intracellular domain of Notch (N ICD) by neuromast specific chemical induction with tamoxifen using the double transgenic line Tg [Cldnb : Gal4 ERT2; 5xUAS-E1b :6 xMYC-notch1a] (XREF_FIG A-G).
